channel.title: Omg? your team sucks?
channel.description:
School team, soccer team, etc,. Well mine really does suck, all these people just join, and they can barely kick the ball, and our team always loses, though the high school team is much better...
any of your sports suck, btw mine was soccer

item.title: Omg? your team sucks?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Not trying to be all hardcore Kane. Just saying, sport should be a part of life. Never said I was the best at everything sport related. It may be his life, but I believe in the moto “You’re here for a good time, not a long time.”

There are about a million other things to do to have fun and have a good time.

item.title: Omg? your team sucks?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Oxy:

Popularity blows just because your smart doesn’t mean your a nerd it me you do the fucking work not fuck around and get a shit job. And just because you cant play football doesn’t mean you cant play another sport if you play sport it you choice and helps you not get fat.

What about being smart and popular? Popularity is based on personality, not intelligence/computer knowledge.

item.title: Omg? your team sucks?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:6, topic:141523”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=193806.msg1746945#msg1746945 date=1189475721]
I used to play soccer a long ass time ago. I was on the all-star team, basically just so that I could travel a bit

There was a big tournament in Sudbury and we won every match. Then in the finals we lost to Toronto 30-0 lmao. Yes, 30.
[/quote]
you have 10 players on the field (excluding the goalie) put the ‘10’ players in defence lol[/quote]

Yeah, not quite sure how it happened. But our team could have been a million times better anyways. Most of my friends, who if anything are better then me, didn’t even make the team.

Those games had high scores though. In house league soccer our scores were usually just a couple goals per team. In all-star, often both teams had more then 10 goals and I really don’t know why.

Read full topic
